transArray.content: Parking is free, check-in and check-out are quick, and the room is tidy

Hello dear guest! Thank you for your recognition of the work of our friends at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Your encouragement is very important. If life is a journey, we are willing to be your warmest site. If meeting is a ballad, we are willing to be your wisp. Happy note, I want you to write your mood in notes. When you leave the hotel, you only need to pick up the electronic parking ticket at the front desk to park for free. Public transportation is accessible in all directions around the hotel, making it the best choice for your business trip and accommodation. Friends, I look forward to meeting you next time at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. I wish you all the best! Manager: Zhao Dan
